attributes.action: Ema should be based on the amount of money brought into the household and how many under 18's/children live in the household instead of just being based on how much money is brought into the household.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that ema should really be based on the amount of children in the house aswell as the income brought into the household. I myself do not get ema as our income is more that £30,000 however there are 3 under 18's in this household and its difficult to cope with the money. 
If say a household with one child earns over £30,000 it will be expected for that child to be able to cope with money difficulties as there is only one, however if there are 3 or 4 children in the household, each child in futher education should qualify for ema.
